annotations.description: There was no time for the supporters to get bored during the game as it was full of action and thrilling moments. It was a very tight match, with not much between the two teams. The home team's main weapon was fast counter attacks, while the away side attempted to hold onto the ball for as long as possible.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.
Lukas Podolski (Inter) strikes the ball towards goal, but it fails to reach the target after being well blocked by one of the defenders.
Samir Handanovic (Inter) obviously intended to delay the restart of play and the referee blows the whistle.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Radja Nainggolan (AS Roma) was probably a bit loose with his words to Daniele Orsato, who decides to show him a yellow.

Rodrigo Palacio (Inter) makes a yard for himself inside the box after an accurate pass and takes a shot that goes just wide of the left post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for AS Roma.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: That will be a yellow card for one of the players. The one who gets booked is Morgan De Sanctis (AS Roma).

annotations.label: time

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Rudi Garcia has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Seydou Doumbia (AS Roma) replacing Daniele De Rossi.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Mauro Icardi (Inter) finds himself some space inside the box to get on the end of a pass from Lukas Podolski, then sends the ball low into the middle of the net. 2:1.
Xherdan Shaqiri (Inter) delivers a poor cross from a free kick as one of the defenders comfortably clears it away.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Today's match ends for Assane Gnoukouri who will be replaced by Lukas Podolski (Inter).

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Daniele De Rossi (AS Roma) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Daniele Orsato had an easy decision to make.
Mauro Icardi (Inter) amazingly found his way through the defence, but lacked a precise finish as his effort from close range went slightly over the crossbar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Xherdan Shaqiri (Inter) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.
Assane Gnoukouri (Inter) attempts to find one of his teammates with a fine lofted pass, but the defence reacts well to intercept the effort. Inter win a corner.
Seydou Keita (AS Roma) picks up a pass, lines up a shot and strikes from 20 metres out, but Samir Handanovic thwarts the effort which is headed to the middle of the goal.
Daniele Orsato blows his whistle and it's Mauro Icardi (Inter) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. Fredy Guarin is going off and Roberto Mancini gives the last tactical orders to Xherdan Shaqiri (Inter).

annotations.label: substitution

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: What was Assane Gnoukouri (Inter) thinking? He will not get away with that. The referee shows him a yellow card.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Daniele Orsato shows the yellow card to Andrea Ranocchia (Inter) for a heavy challenge.
Danilo D'Ambrosio (Inter) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
The defence successfully catches Rodrigo Palacio (Inter) in the offside trap, but it was close!

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals a substitution. Mateo Kovacic (Inter) is brought on as a substitute for Marcelo Brozovic.
Hernanes (Inter) sends over a cross from the side into the penalty area in order to find one of his teammates, but he fails and the opportunity goes begging.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Alessandro Florenzi (AS Roma) is cleared by the defence.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alessandro Florenzi (AS Roma) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders. AS Roma force a corner. They send men into the box.
Samir Handanovic pulls off a stunning save to block the free kick from Miralem Pjanic (AS Roma). The ball was heading towards the bottom left corner. AS Roma have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Daniele Orsato shows a yellow card to Juan, who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
Daniele Orsato blows the whistle, Juan is penalised for a foul. Another situation results in a direct free kick for AS Roma.
Morgan De Sanctis pulls off a great save to deny Fredy Guarin (Inter), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick shot to the left side of the goal.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's in the back of the net! Radja Nainggolan (AS Roma) fires a brilliant volley into the bottom left corner from the edge of the box, leaving the goalkeeper helpless. Miralem Pjanic provided the assist. What a finish! 1:1.
Konstantinos Manolas (AS Roma) timed his run perfectly to connect with the resulting corner kick, but his finish from around the penalty spot was rather poor as it went well wide of the left post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alessandro Florenzi (AS Roma) will take the corner.
Gervinho (AS Roma) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender. AS Roma force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.
Miralem Pjanic plays a lovely pass into Alessandro Florenzi (AS Roma), but he can't find the target. His strike from inside the box goes narrowly over the crossbar.
Jose Holebas (AS Roma) is moving okay again after that injury scare.
Alessandro Florenzi (AS Roma) sends a quick through ball into space for his teammate who is lurking close to the offside line, but one of the defenders intercepts and clears the danger.
Victor Ibarbo (AS Roma) commits an ugly tackle on his opponent, but there is no caution from the referee.

annotations.label: injury

Mauro Icardi (Inter) finds himself in a promising position after receiving a precise pass. He pulls the trigger but only hits one of the opposition, who gets in the way of his effort.
Mauro Icardi (Inter) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
Victor Ibarbo (AS Roma) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.

Alessandro Florenzi (AS Roma) attempts to find one of his teammates with a ball from a free kick outside the box. The goalkeeper climbs high above all the players in the box to intercept the cross and snuff out the opportunity.
Daniele Orsato blows his whistle after Danilo D'Ambrosio (Inter) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball. AS Roma will take a free kick near the side line.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The players are back out on the pitch following the half time break and the second half is about to start.

Both sides have been very active in the first half, providing the fans with an exciting show. Both sides have struggled for dominance over the game. Both teams are attempting to play possession football.

annotations.label: whistle

Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) wins the ball after the corner kick and takes a shot from the edge of the box, but it's blocked by one of the defending players.

Alessandro Florenzi (AS Roma) is able to continue to play.

Hello, welcome to our live play by play commentaries. You will be able to see a written form of all the interesting moments of the game, so you won't miss a thing. Sit back and have fun.

There was no time for the supporters to get bored during the game as it was full of action and thrilling moments. It was a very tight match, with not much between the two teams. The home team's main weapon was fast counter attacks, while the away side attempted to hold onto the ball for as long as possible.
